title: SEO Fulfillment Specialist (Part-Time)
job_overview:
Are you detail-oriented, efficient, and have a working knowledge of SEO? Our digital marketing and SEO services company is seeking a SEO Fulfillment Specialist to handle the hands-on processing and fulfillment of SEO trial orders. You will be responsible for executing key SEO tasks, ensuring accurate and timely delivery of services, and supporting our goal of delivering exceptional value to new clients during their trial period.

Key Responsibilities:
Process and fulfill SEO free trial orders, ensuring each task is executed to meet quality standards.
Perform essential SEO work, such as keyword research, meta tag creation, basic on-page optimization, and backlink submissions (as applicable to our trial package).
Follow internal workflows and checklists to ensure consistent delivery of services.
Monitor timelines and prioritize tasks to meet client trial deadlines.
Communicate status updates and flag issues to the Operations Manager or team lead as needed.
Contribute to client satisfaction by ensuring that all trial deliverables are complete, accurate, and impactful.

Qualifications:
Foundational to intermediate understanding of SEO (on-page, off-page, keyword optimization, etc.).
Prior experience in SEO, digital marketing, or task fulfillment roles preferred.
Strong attention to detail and ability to follow structured processes.
Comfortable working independently and handling multiple tasks at once.
Good communication skills and ability to report progress clearly.
Familiarity with tools like Google Sheets, Trello, Asana, or other workflow platforms.

If you meet these qualifications and are passionate about delivering exceptional customer service, especially with SEO expertise, we invite you to apply using the link below.
